about_the_game:
Welcome to Realm's Crossing, where the classic thrill of strategy board games converges with modern technology to allow advanced mechanics and stunning visuals. Prepare to engage in epic battles, strategic alliances, and tactical manoeuvres to snatch the victory under your opponents noses.

Balance between marching your armies, expanding your empire by building and recruiting new units to support your Conquest. Don't forget to secure resource supply lines to maintain your Empire!

TiltFive Edition

The TiltFive edition of Realm's Crossing makes the game board truly come alive with it's high fidelity holograms.

Several features that improve immersion and local multiplayer have also been added.

Actions are now performed by physically moving wooden figurines, just as one would on a real battle map.

Each player has their own hidden UI so that trading and diplomacy can be done in secret.

Multiplayer

Play with up to 5 players, either locally or remote or a mixture. The game supports up to 4 TiltFive glasses and wands but it is also possible to control multiple teams from one pair of glasses if you pass around the controllers to the other player's turn. Other players can also join remotely with the base game or on their TiltFive DLC version of the game.

You can also replace any number of players with computer AI. Whether you’re playing solo or with friends, the game adapts to your needs.

Diverse Win Conditions

There are many ways to achieve Victory. Other than Military Conquest, building, trading and resource control are viable ways to win the game.

Unique Playable Races

There are five playable races, Undead, Elves, Orcs, Giants and Humans. Each having unique perks and heroes. Find the one that best suits your playstyle!

Unique Heroes

Each race has their own hero with their unique magical power and strengths and weaknesses. Some are great at supporting their armies while others perform well on their own.

Tactical Movements

Create an effective army that suits your need. Footmen are cost efficient but slow, Cavalry is fast but expensive and Archers are great at supporting but require protection.

Keep your units alive so they can level up and get stronger!

Turn Based Gameplay

Play in your own time without stress. Take a break if you have to and pick up the game whenever you wish to continue.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 550 MB available space

short_description: Realm's Crossing is a turn-based strategy tabletop game. Victory can be achieved in multiple ways so whatever your playstyle is, you will have a good time. Balance between controlling your hero and army, expanding your base, controlling supply paths and training new troops to optimize your strategy.
